Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Barack Obama tried many times to meet with Kim Jong Un but was rebuffed.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks evidence to support the assertion that the Obama administration was constantly begging for meetings with Kim Jong Un.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that there was a desire from the Obama administration to meet with Kim Jong Un, which experts say is not true.
Exist alternative explanation: The experts provide an alternative explanation that Barack Obama never indicated any interest in meeting with Kim Jong Un during his presidency.
